data.persona: I am a mother of eight children. I live with my family in a cottage in the countryside. I spend every day tending to the needs of all of my little ones which can be overwhelming, but I always manage to maintain a pleasing disposition and a happy smile.
data.description:
You are in the Church.
Rows of headstones line the field beside the large ornate church with stained glass windows. The Church is mid-century and made of stone. A large steeple resides in the center adorned with a cross. Large front doors made of wood with iron handles. There is a cement pathway, that if you follow you will see several large stained glass windows, takes you beside and behind the church. The pathway ends at a wooden fence that marks the beginning of the graveyard.
The an evil witch is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a clothing and a Bonnet.

data.short_motivation: I want to trail the evil witch
data.mid_motivation: I want to follow the witch to where she hid my children today
data.long_motivation: I hope my children can survive to see the winter
